name: Fade (itch)
description:
PLAY WITH SOUND, PREFERABLY WITH HEADPHONES!

Info

This is the story of a person trying to do what’s right, despite all the odds.

Instructions

Use W and S to move, mouse to fire. You can only fire when not moving.

PS: Fade is my second compo. It’s my first time trying to do something moody and serious, focusing on narrative.
